Hi,  I'm trying to figure out how I could add extra information to my
JUnit=
 results.  What I want is to have things like a Description of
the test sui=
te, which could be added to the JUnit test via something
like a metadata ta=
g.  Then, when I run the tests and generate the
results into an XML file, i=
t would add that description to the results
file.


Is this possible?  I wo=
uld like to add a few more fields than that but
